verses.verse: Why standest <S%H5975><s%> thou afar off <S%H7350><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? Why hidest <S%H5956><s%> thou thyself in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>?

In the pride <S%H1346><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> is hotly pursued <S%H1814><s%>; Let them be taken <S%H8610><s%> in the devices <S%H4209><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have conceived <S%H2803><s%>.

For the wicked <S%H7563><s%> boasteth <S%H1984><s%> of his heart <S%H5315><s%>'s desire <S%H8378><s%>, And the covetous <S%H1214><s%> renounceth <S%H1288><s%>, yea <S%H5006><s%>, contemneth Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%>, in the pride <S%H1363><s%> of his countenance <S%H639><s%>, saith <S%H1875><s%>, He will not require it <S%H4209><s%>. All his thoughts are <S%H430><s%>, There is no God.

His ways <S%H1870><s%> are firm <S%H2342><s%> at all times <S%H6256><s%>; Thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are far above <S%H4791><s%> out of his sight <S%H6887><s%>: As for all his adversaries, he puffeth at them <S%H6315><s%>.
He saith <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, I shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>; To all generations <S%H1755><s%> I shall not be in adversity <S%H7451><s%>.

His mouth <S%H6310><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%> and deceit <S%H4820><s%> and oppression <S%H8496><s%>: Under his tongue <S%H3956><s%> is mischief <S%H5999><s%> and iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

He sitteth <S%H3427><s%> in the lurking-places <S%H3993><s%> of the villages <S%H2691><s%>; In the secret places <S%H3993><s%> doth he murder <S%H2026><s%> the innocent <S%H5355><s%>; His eyes <S%H5869><s%> are privily set <S%H6845><s%> against the helpless <S%H2489><s%>.

He lurketh <S%H693><s%> in secret <S%H4565><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> in his covert <S%H5520><s%>; He lieth in wait <S%H693><s%> to catch <S%H2414><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>: He doth catch <S%H2414><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%>, when he draweth <S%H4900><s%> him in his net <S%H7568><s%>.
He croucheth <S%H1794><s%>, he boweth <S%H7817><s%> down <S%H2489><s%>, And the helpless fall <S%H5307><s%> by his strong ones <S%H6099><s%>.
He saith <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, God <S%H410><s%> hath forgotten <S%H7911><s%>; He hideth <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>; he will never <S%H5331><s%> see it <S%H7200><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; O God <S%H410><s%>, lift up <S%H5375><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: Forget <S%H7911><s%> not the poor <S%H6035><s%>.
Wherefore doth the wicked <S%H7563><s%> contemn <S%H5006><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, And say <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, Thou wilt not require it <S%H1875><s%>?

Thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5027><s%>; for thou beholdest mischief <S%H5999><s%> and spite <S%H3708><s%>, to requite <S%H5414><s%> it with thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: The helpless <S%H2489><s%> committeth <S%H5800><s%> himself unto thee <S%H5826><s%>; Thou hast been the helper of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>.

Break <S%H7665><s%> thou the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; And as for the evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H1875><s%>, seek out his wickedness <S%H7562><s%> till thou find <S%H4672><s%> none <S%H1077><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is King <S%H4428><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>: The nations <S%H1471><s%> are perished <S%H6><s%> out of his land <S%H776><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast heard <S%H8085><s%> the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the meek <S%H6035><s%>: Thou wilt prepare <S%H3559><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%>, thou wilt cause thine ear <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H7181><s%>;
To judge <S%H8199><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the oppressed <S%H1790><s%>, That man <S%H582><s%> who is of the earth <S%H776><s%> may be terrible <S%H6206><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%>.
